Package org.ejbca.core.protocol.ws.common

Class CertificateHelper

java.lang.Object
org.ejbca.core.protocol.ws.common.CertificateHelper
public class CertificateHelper extends Object
Class used to generate a java.security.Certificate from a org.ejbca.core.protocol.ws.common.Certificate $Id$

    static final String
    RESPONSETYPE_CERTIFICATE
    Indicates that the requester want a BASE64 encoded certificate in the CertificateResponse object.
    static final String
    RESPONSETYPE_CMC_FULL_PKI
    Indicates that the CMC full PKI response(MSAE key archival) in the CertificateResponse object.
    static final String
    RESPONSETYPE_PKCS7
    Indicates that the requester want a BASE64 encoded pkcs7 in the CertificateResponse object.
    static final String
    RESPONSETYPE_PKCS7WITHCHAIN
    Indicates that the requester want a BASE64 encoded pkcs7 with the complete chain in the CertificateResponse object.

  • Method Details

    • getCertificate

      public static Certificate getCertificate(byte[] certificateData) throws CertificateException
      Method that builds a certificate from the data in the WS response.
      Parameters:
      certificateData - byte array with base64 encoded Certificate type
      Returns:
      Certificate
      Throws:
      CertificateException - if certificateData can not be decoded

    • getPKCS7

      public static byte[] getPKCS7(byte[] pkcs7Data)
      Simple method that just returns raw PKCS7 data instead of the BASE64 encoded contained in the WS response
      Parameters:
      pkcs7Data - byte array with base64 encoded data
      Returns:
      byte array with binary (decoded base64) data
